name: BitKAM
description: Launched on 31/12/2019 by a team based in Singapore, BitKAM Token (KAM) is the native token of BitKAM Network, an ecosystem comprising the BitKAM crypto network, BitKAM cryptocurrency exchange, BitKAM Token (KAM), and BitKAM Charity. The BitKAM (KAM) token is used for the network to create incentives, bonuses, and reward programs. Users can earn BitKAM (KAM) by participating in the BitKAM Network activities and bonus structure programs. By holding BitKAM (KAM), users can participate in the BitKAM interest token program which reduces trading fees from the BitKAM cryptocurrency exchange by up to 85%.
